ovdesc.p: This screen is used to define different roles of debit and credit parties and map them to relevant tags of a SWIFT payment in the payments hub.A record authorised in this screen will create or amend or delete a record in store table, PPT.PARTYROLE.

desc.p: Record Status Code generated for the record by the payments hub.
The value is not editable by the user.
Used for internal purpose. Value of this field determines values of fields, 'RAC' and 'RSC'
This field can hold upto 1 alphanumeric character and the value is not editable by the user.
Used for internal purpose.Holds the ID of the current live record of store table.
This field can hold upto 65 alphanumeric characters and the value is not editable by the user.
Unique ID generated by the payments hub in order to identify each record in the application.
Used for internal purpose. Holds the ID of the previous live record of store table.
This field can hold upto 65 alphanumeric characters and the value is not editable by the user.

Contains all the override messages which the user agreed to during Input. During the validation of a transaction, the system may provide the user with a series of screen override messages to indicate an anomaly.
The 16 predefined roles can be used to describe the role for Debit/Credit parties.
INSPTY Instructing Party `50 C or L
ORDPTY Ordering Party 50 A, F, G, H or K
ASVINS Account Servicing Institution 52A or C
SNDCBK Sender’s Correspondent Bank 53A, B or D
RCVCBK Receiver’s Correspondent Bank 54A, B or D
TRMINS Third Reimbursement Institution 55A, B or D
INTINS Intermediary Institution 56 A, C or D
ACWINS Account with Institution 57 A, B, C or D
BENINS Beneficiary Institution 58 A or D
BENFCY Beneficiary 59A or no letter option
Free Text used to describe the Party Role created.
Specifies the tag number to be associated with the party role configured
Record Activation Code generated for the record by the payment's hub.
The value is not editable by the user.
